headline: Caterpillar Inc. (CAT): Among the Dividend Stocks with Sustainable Payout Ratios
summary: We recently published a list of the 10 Dividend Stocks with Sustainable Payout Ratios. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) stands against other best dividend stocks with sustainable payout ratios. Dividend-paying stocks have remained popular among investors due to their strong historical performance.
